name: Peril in Time
description:
*CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED*

Controller Controls -

  • Movement - Left Stick
  • Shoot - A
  • Parry - X
  • Change Weapon - LB & RB
  • Change Parry - RT 
  • Fire Charged shot, from parry - LT
  • Smoke Bomb - Y
  • Pause/Unpause - Start

Keyboard Controls -

  • Movement - WASD or Arrows
  • A on menu - Space
  • B on menu - Backspace
  • Shoot - J & Space
  • Parry - H 
  • Change Weapon - K & L 
  • Fire Charged Shot, from parry - N
  • Smoke Bomb - M
  • Pause/Unpause - Esc
